jd: From: Vinita Singh, Tek Inspirations vinita.singh@tekinspirations.com Reply to: vinita.singh@tekinspirations.com Max rate $45/hr Job Description -Need Active LinkedIn id of the candidate and must submit the DL copy- else candidate will be rejected. Senior Database Administrator Duration: 6+ months Location: Remote Implementation: Luxoft Client: Optum Project descriptionWe are seeking a skilled Database Administrator to join our cloud migration initiative focused on modernizing applications across multiple cloud platforms, including AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and Microsoft Azure. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in ensuring the seamless migration, optimization, and management of databases as part of our modernization strategy.ResponsibilitiesThe ideal candidate will play a critical role in ensuring the seamless migration, optimization, and management of databases as part of our modernization strategy. Must have Skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience as a Database Administrator with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).Strong knowledge of database management, optimization, and administration on cloud environments.Experience with cloud-native database solutions and services.Familiarity with migration tools and techniques for cloud environments.Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Strong communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team setting.Nice to haveCertifications in AWS, GCP, or Azure database management.Experience in a multi-cloud environment.Understanding of application modernization practices and principles. E: vinita.singh@tekinspirations.com Contact No-+ 469-205-(6817)
